videos.title: (Sentry) New Performance Issues
videos.description: We've released new Performance Issues for Frontend, Backend, and Mobile recently. N+1 API Calls, Large Render-blocking Assets, and Slow Database Queries are just a few of them.

videos.title: (Sentry) Jetpack Compose AMA | Teaser
videos.description: A teaser video for the upcoming Jetpack Compose AMA with the Sentry team.

videos.title: (Sentry) Mobile: The Future is Declarative
videos.description: A thought leadership piece of how the future of mobile development is shaping up to be fully declarative.

videos.title: (Chakra UI) Design vs Dev Challenge #2 - Afrosonic Dashboard Concept
videos.description: Welcome to the second Design vs Dev Challenge video! Since a lot of you loved the previous challenge, I decided to make this one a bit more complex and fun!

videos.title: (Chakra UI) Design vs Dev Challenge #1 - Chat App
videos.description: Welcome to the first Design vs Dev Challenge video! In this series we're going to rebuild various Dribbble shots using Chakra UI. If you want to see a certain Dribbble shot rebuilt, share the link in the comments below.

videos.title: (Chakra UI) Getting Started with Chakra UI
videos.description: A simple Getting Started with Chakra UI video that showcases how to create a new Next JS app, install and setup Chakra UI. As a demo I'm creating a simple Login form.
